content: *decrease single_crochet 4* repeat around 10 stitches row 19 single_crochet 10 10 stitches eyes put your eyes in now row 20 *decrease single_crochet 3* repeat around 8 stitches add a bit more stuffing row 21 *decrease single_crochet 2* repeat around 6 stitches bind bind off and leave a small tail using your needle thread around the outside of the remaining stitches and pull closed tie off and thread the tail back up through the body shape using your needle poke it into the stuffing near the head use it to push a little bit of that stuffing down into the nose twist the ears so that they curve around the right way over the eyes criss wall https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/all-in-one-mouse criss wall https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/all-in-one-mouse
